title: 2013–14 Swiss Super League
text:
The 2013–14 <a href="Swiss%20Super%20League">Swiss Super League</a>, was the 117th season of top-tier <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It began on 13 July 2013 and ended on 18 May 2014. <a href="FC%20Basel">Basel</a> successfully defended their title for a record fifth time in a row.
A total of 10 teams competed in the league. The 9 best teams from the 2012–13 season and the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Swiss%20Challenge%20League">2012–13 Swiss Challenge League</a> champion <a href="FC%20Aarau">FC Aarau</a>.
League table.
